entry.title: ELA 30-1 Exit Project
entry.content:
This project involves the use of resources provided by others, credits are given at the end of the video below. Thus, the video portion of the project is not licensed under any Creative Commons License. The use of pictures is justified as fair use for education. Thank you for those who made this project possible.

Synopsis

entry.title: University of Lethbridge
entry.content: I will almost certainly go to University of Lethbridge, provided that I do not fail ELA 30-1. I will study chemistry as a major and computer science as a minor, toward a Bachelor of Science degree. About the future, I really don’t know much (though I fantasy much), a research chemist, a forensic scientist, a programmer, or a police officer (I don’t know why I consider it…)? Sharing experience is appreciated. I have a lot of time to think…

entry.title: Hello World! 你好世界！Saluton Mondo!
entry.content:
Hello World! 你好世界！Saluton Mondo!

php php <?php echo "hello, world"; echo "你好世界"; echo "saluton, mondo"; ?> ``` cpp c++

include

using namespace std;

int main() { cout << “hello, world” << endl; cout << “你好世界” << endl; cout << “saluton, mondo” << endl; return 0; } go golang
package main

func main() { println(“hello, world”) println(“你好世界”) println(“saluton, mondo”) } html HTML <!DOCTYPE html> 

<title>hello, world</title>


<p>hello, world</p>
<p>你好世界</p>
<p>saluton, mondo</p>

```
